scripts.prune-lambda:
aws lambda list-functions --region eu-west-1 --query 'Functions[].FunctionName' --output text | tr '	' '
'| xargs -I {} aws lambda delete-function --region us-east-1 --function-name {}
scripts.init-auth: aws cognito-idp initiate-auth --profile=tileview_dev --region=eu-west-1 --client-id=31jg63lafo8rqfdl9usoqeu36b --auth-flow USER_PASSWORD_AUTH --auth-parameters USERNAME=test,PASSWORD=P@55w0rd!23 --output json
